item.title: Becoming a Registered PRINCE2 Practitioner
item.description: Welcome to PRINCE2 training podcast channel brought to you by Knowledge Train. This is our first podcast and in this cast Simon talks about the benefits of becoming a PRINCE2 Practitioner and how to become a PRINCE2 Practitioner
item.itunes:author: Simon Buehring | Knowledge Train
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to PRINCE2 training podcast channel brought to you by Knowledge Train. This is our first podcast and in this cast Simon talks about the benefits of becoming a PRINCE2 Practitioner and how to become a PRINCE2 Practitioner

item.itunes:keywords: PRINCE2, podcast, PRINCE2 training, become a PRINCE2 Practitioner, what is PRINCE2

item.title: Benefits of PRINCE2
item.description: Welcome to PRINCE2 training podcast channel brought to you by Knowledge Train. This is our second podcast and in this cast Simon talks about the benefits of using PRINCE2, as well as the benefits of taking PRINCE2 training and obtaining PRINCE2 qualification.
item.itunes:author: Simon Buehring | Knowledge Train
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to PRINCE2 training podcast channel brought to you by Knowledge Train. This is our second podcast and in this cast Simon talks about the benefits of using PRINCE2, as well as the benefits of obtaining PRINCE2 qualification.

item.itunes:keywords: PRINCE2, podcast, PRINCE2 training, benefits of PRINCE2, what is PRINCE2

item.title: PRINCE2 Foundation Exam
item.description: Welcome to PRINCE2 training podcast channel brought to you by Knowledge Train. This is our third podcast and in this cast Simon talks about the PRINCE2 Foundation exam, in particular the objectives and format of the exam, and how you should go about preparing for the exam.

item.description: Welcome to PRINCE2 training podcast channel brought to you by Knowledge Train. This is our forth podcast and in this cast Simon talks about the accredited PRINCE2 training and how you should prepare for the training before attending the course.
